Package com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase.StudentController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/students") public class StudentController extends Object
Controller handling requests related to Students.
Since:
JDK 17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mariusz Gruszczynski, Mateusz Pysera
